trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the dump file
trans-unit.target: Specify the name of the dump file

trans-unit.source: Generate a dump file if the test process hangs
trans-unit.target: Generate a dump file if the test process hangs

trans-unit.source: Hang dump timeout of '{0}' expired
trans-unit.target: Hang dump timeout of '{0}' expired

trans-unit.source: Specify the timeout after which the dump will be generated. The timeout value is specified in one of the following formats: 1.5h, 1.5hour, 1.5hours, 90m, 90min, 90minute, 90minutes 5400s, 5400sec, 5400second, 5400seconds. Default is 30m.
trans-unit.target: Specify the timeout after which the dump will be generated. The timeout value is specified in one of the following formats: 1.5h, 1.5hour, 1.5hours, 90m, 90min, 90minute, 90minutes 5400s, 5400sec, 5400second, 5400seconds. Default is 30m.

trans-unit.source: '--hangdump-timeout' expects a single timeout argument
trans-unit.target: '--hangdump-timeout' expects a single timeout argument

trans-unit.source: Specify the type of the dump. Valid values are 'Mini', 'Heap', 'Triage' (only available in .NET 6+) or 'Full'. Default type is 'Full'
trans-unit.target: Specify the type of the dump. Valid values are 'Mini', 'Heap', 'Triage' (only available in .NET 6+) or 'Full'. Default type is 'Full'

trans-unit.source: '{0}' is not a valid dump type. Valid options are 'Mini', 'Heap', 'Triage' (only available in .NET 6+) and 'Full'
trans-unit.target: '{0}' is not a valid dump type. Valid options are 'Mini', 'Heap', 'Triage' (only available in .NET 6+) and 'Full'

trans-unit.source: Request of type '{0}' is not supported
trans-unit.target: Request of type '{0}' is not supported

trans-unit.target: The list of tests that were running at the time of the hang
